name: Starbucks Coffee
description: The Starbucks Coffee location inside the Eldorado Resort offers the full range of Starbucks beverages, including handcrafted espresso drinks, Frappuccinos, teas, refreshers, and seasonal favorites. A convenient stop for guests heading out to the golf course or returning from a day of adventures in the High Sierra.
shortDescription: Full-service Starbucks inside the Eldorado for your favorite handcrafted beverages.

faqs.question: Is this a full Starbucks?
faqs.answer: Yes, offering the complete Starbucks menu of handcrafted beverages.

faqs.question: Where is it located?
faqs.answer: Inside the Eldorado Resort, conveniently located for guests.

faqs.question: Can I use my Starbucks Rewards?
faqs.answer: Check with the location for current Starbucks Rewards acceptance.

meta.title: Starbucks Coffee at Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Grab your favorite Starbucks beverages inside Eldorado Resort Casino in downtown Reno.

testimonials.quote: Had dinner at Starbucks Coffee after our round and it was fantastic. Great food, attentive service, and they handled our group of 16 without a hitch. GTHS recommended it and they were spot on.
testimonials.author: Nathan N.

testimonials.quote: Golf the High Sierra arranged our group dinner at Starbucks Coffee and it was a highlight of the trip. Great atmosphere, excellent food, and they accommodated all our dietary needs.
testimonials.author: Jennifer M.
